amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to pay the salaries and expenses of personnel to carry out the section of the Medicare Prescription Drug, Improvement and Modernization Act of 2003 that deals with federal reimbursement of emergency health services furnished to undocumented aliens.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds in the bill to pay the salaries and expenses of personnel to carry out the section of the Medicare Prescription Drug, Improvement and Modernization Act of 2003 that deals with federal reimbursement of emergency health services furnished to undocumented aliens.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tancredo amendment (A022) Failed by voice vote.
